Enum EnvironmentTimeoutType

Used to identify the type of FigaroEnv timeout setting.

Namespace: Figaro
Assembly: Figaro.dll
Syntax
public enum EnvironmentTimeoutType

Fields

Name Description
Lock

The timeout value for locks in this database environment.

MutexFailcheck

If fail check broadcasting has been configured, then set the timeout value on how long a thread will wait for a mutex lock before checking whether FailCheck() has marked the mutex as failed. The default is to check once every second.
Register

Set the timeout value on how long to wait for processes to exit the environment before recovery is started when the Open(String, EnvOpenOptions) method was called with the Register flag and recovery must be performed.
Transaction

The timeout value for transactions in this database environment.
See Also
SetTimeout(UInt32, EnvironmentTimeoutType)
GetTimeout(EnvironmentTimeoutType)
